name: Sometimes You Really Should Look A Gift
short_description: Times are tough and we all get very excited when we find or receive a little bit of unexpected money. This could be $10 from a scratch off card, finding that you had a security deposit that you are receiving back, or even receiving an unexpected check for a refund from the IRS. While it can be exciting to find some [extra money](http://internationalfinance.blogspot.com/) it is not always a good idea to accept the money without first asking a few questions.
summary: You Really Should Look A Gift Horse In The Mouth.
